<<<<<<< HEAD
Some directions to the panting-soul which hath been long travelling in the letter, but hath not yet been acquainted with the power... Penington, Isaac, 1616-1679.
8 p.
Printed for Robert Wilson ..., London : 1661.
Signed on p. 8: Isaac Penington, the Younger. Imprint from colophon. Imperfect: cropped and stained, with loss of text. Defective British Library copy spliced at end. Reproduction of originals in Bodleian Library and British Library.
=======
